svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Electricity share by fuel source, India
Electricity production (measured as the percentage of total electricity production) by source (coal, oil, gas, nuclear,
hydroelectric power and other renewables). Other renewables in this definition includes biomass, wind, solar,
Source: International Energy Agency (IEA) via The World Bank
